titles.title: Tell Me the Stories of Jesus

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Tell me the stories of Jesus I love to hear; Things I would ask Him to tell me If He were here; Scenes by the wayside, Tales of the sea, Stories of Jesus, Tell them to me.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: First let me hear how the children Stood round His knee; and I shall fancy His blessing Resting on me: Words full of kindness, Deeds full of grace, All in the love-light Of Jesus' face.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Into the city I'd follow, The children's band, Waving a branch of the palm tree High in my hand; One of His heralds, Yes, I would sing Loudest hosannas! Jesus is King. Amen.
